description: Beatrice was the oldest princess of http://anidb.net/ch101311 [Aaresu Oukoku]. In order to secure peace with the neighboring http://anidb.net/ch101310 [Barugoguransu Oukoku], she was married to its king, http://anidb.net/ch101178 [Francesco], and thus she became its queen.
name: Beatrice
